message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you reaching out.  $120 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. How about $85?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $85. How about $102.50?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $102.50 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to meet you at $90.  Let me know what you think.
I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob! I'm willing to come down a bit more. How about we meet at $92.50?
